definition: erhua variant of 嗓子眼[sang3 zi5 yan3]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: The thickness still came in his throat .
sentences.chinese: 他嗓子眼儿里还是阵阵发紧。

sentences.english: My heart was in my mouth when I reached the top of the  roller coaster.
sentences.chinese: 过山车到达最高点的时候，我的心都提到嗓子眼儿了。

sentences.english: I had my heart in my mouth when I went to ask the boss for more money.
sentences.chinese: 我去向老板再要一些钱时心跳到了嗓子眼儿里。

sentences.english: My heart was in my mouth when I reached the top of the roller coaster.
sentences.chinese: 过山车到达最高点的时候，我的心都提到嗓子眼儿了。

sentences.english: The thickness still came in his throat.
sentences.chinese: 他嗓子眼儿里还是阵阵发紧。

definition: thumping sound (onom.)/to be eager and anxious (to do sth)/faithful and upright
restless with anxiety/unbearably hot and anxious
(onom.) beating of the heart/pitapat/pulsation of a machine
to jump about/(of the heart) to beat wildly
to suppress (a sob, harsh words etc)
to get angry/to burn with rage
